shortDescription: wpsupdater.exe in Kingsoft WPS Office through 11.2.0.10382 allows remote code execution by modifying HKEY_CURRENT_USER in the registry.
vulnerabilityName: Kingsoft WPS Office through 11.2.0.10382 wpsupdater.exe Remote Code Execution
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
